title: Creamy cauliflower mash
ingredients: ['1 whole cauliflower, cut into florets', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste', '1 tablespoon low fat cream cheese', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt, or to taste', '1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste']
